name: Forbidden Escape (itch)
description:
When your tribe found out about your forbidden research, they kicked you out! Now you have to escape the deadly mountain pass before you run out of food.

You can see how many mountains are in a row or column. Exploring a card costs 1 food. If you run out of food, you die. Get to the exit to win!

Controls:

Arrow Keys or Left Mouse Button - Explore adjacent card
R - Restart game
Esc - Exit game

Credits:

Sprites and programming by Neopolis
Sound effects by WOWSound and Zach Striefel
Music by Bensound.com
Made for OMGJam 6
